packages.name: MavensMate
packages.description: MavensMate for Sublime Text is a plugin that aims to replicate the functionality of the Eclipse-based Force.com IDE.
packages.author: joeferraro

osx.release_notes: Adds lines covered and low coverage indicator to org coverage report. Adds Scrub Log command which filters log to only user debug statements. Release notes: http://mavensmate.com/Getting_Started/Release_Notes
